content: I think I'll start by creating a simple recipe with coconut oil, olive oil, and sweet almond oil. I'll use a lye calculator to ensure the right concentration of lye. For additives, I'll start with oatmeal and aloe vera to provide soothing and moisturizing properties. I'll also consider adding tea tree oil for its antibacterial properties. Do you think I should add any exfoliating ingredients like ground oats or walnut shells to help remove dirt and dead skin cells?
